column3: Lads getting new bikes in the same color, so their wives wouldn't know gave me a laugh.
not much style for Rapha, sad
Quality cycles and nice to see something made in the UK.

Had a Mercian since I was 16. (Now 41). Mercian have resprayed it a few time. Lovely frame. For long distance or winter riding, I take the Mercian. The carbon stays hanging up for racing. Great little vid.
wonderful artistry, I just found a 1970 Superlight in Legnano green, a stunning frame...can;t wait to outfit it in its former glory with campy nuovo record.
Fantastic video. Love the old school nature of it, none of this fancy carbon shit.
That head tube lugs a beauty
might go visit there factory i live in derby :)
